cooldown.description: Manage the cooldown of a channel.

set.description: Set the cooldown of a channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where you want to set the cooldown.

reset.description: Reset the cooldown of a channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where you want to reset the cooldown.

messages.description: Manage the messages of a channel.

pin.description: Pin a message on the current channel.

message.name: message
message.description: ID of the message you want to pin.

purge.description: Purge a number of messages from a channel.

messages.name: messages
messages.description: Number of messages you want to purge.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where you want to purge messages.

unpin.description: Unpin a message on the current channel.

message.name: message
message.description: ID of the message you want to unpin.

nsfw.description: Switch the NSFW mode of a channel.

enable.description: Enable the NSFW mode of a channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where you want to enable the NSFW mode.

disable.description: Disable the NSFW mode of a channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where you want to disable the NSFW mode.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where the information will come from.

invite.description: Create an instant invite of a channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where to create the instant invite.

temporary.name: temporary
temporary.description: Specify if you want to grant temporary or permanent membership.

max-uses.name: max-uses
max-uses.description: Maximum number of uses of the invite.

force.name: force
force.description: Force the creation of the invite.
